name: Private Kowalski
descriptions: Private Kowalski is an NCR private encountered in Boulder City in 2281.

An enlisted soldier in the ranks of the New California Republic Army, normally stationed at Camp McCarran, Private Kowalski has recently received leave and plans to head home to see his family in California with a caravan, going through the 188 Trading Post. During a layover at the post, he decided to make his way to Boulder City, to pay his respects to his older brother, Donald, at the Boulder City Memorial. His brother sacrificed himself so that the rest of the unit could evacuate some of the wounded during the terminal stages of the First Battle of Hoover Dam.

topics.response_text: You here to pay your respects, too?

topics.topic_text: You're a little bitch and your brother was, too.

topics.response_text: It commemorates the Battle of Hoover Dam. The rangers lured the best of Caesar's Legion into Boulder City, then blew the whole town up.

topics.topic_text: My apologies. It was rude and disrespectful of me to do that.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] All right, apology accepted. Don't let it happen again.
Camp McCarran, but I'm on leave at the moment - heading back to California to see my folks.
Just get the fuck away from here, already.

conversation.response_text: Oh, that's it. Your ass is mine!
